title: Pegoretti Silca Ciavete Hiro Pumps Return
content:
In 2015, Silcaâ€™s popular Hiro pump got a splash of color when Officina Pegoretti, began a special series of Ciavete pieces. When that collaboration came to a natural end, Pegoretti created the occasional Cavete Hiro on request, but always at the initiation of the client, who also supplied the pump.

Now, the Italian brand has restarted its Cavete Hiro program. This time, not only is it sourcing and supplying the pumps itself, but for the first time, it is offering a matching Cavete Hiro as an option when customers order one of its frames with Ciavete artwork.x

When you order a frame with a Ciavete paint job, the Silca Hiro Price is 980 Euros or $1200 USD (landed).

See more at Pegoretti.
